text: Nɨ oragh, kɨ 80plan azeniba iti, egha deragha bizir aghuiba ko kurabagh fozir puvatɨ. Kɨ dagheba ko dɨpabar amɨva deragh dar isɨngtɨziba baraghan kogham, manam derazɨ manam ikufi. Nan kuarimning uaghan ikufi, eghtɨ gumazamiziba ighiabar amutɨ, kɨ me onger ighiaba baraghan kogham. Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ tizim bagh nɨn gɨn mangɨva osɨmtɨzim nɨ danɨngam? Ti puvatɨgham.
